subject: FCMB BANK.
body:
FCMB BANK.
Sir,
This is to notify you today Friday dated 26th day of August 2022 that
I have finalized with your fund ($10.500,000.00) transfer process and
also forwarded a telex message to the payee bank in China to contact
and effect your payment through their online banking system.
Your information has been forwarded to the China Merchants Bank to
enable them set up an online bank account with your name and
information to enable you transfer your fund from the online account
to any of your local bank account coordinate.
For a satisfactory payment relief and acknowledgment, you are directed
to forward your
claim request and inquiries to the China Merchant Bank via their below
operational Channel:
(A) YOUR FULL NAME
(B) FULL ADDRESS
(C) YOUR DIRECT TELEPHONE LINE.
(D) COPY OF YOUR PASSPORT OR DRIVERS LICENSE
Contact Person: Yu Xie
Fund Manager
China Merchants Bank
Telex Transfer Section, Asia Pacific
Email: 
cmb_accts@securecmbonline.com
To enable them pay urgent attention to your file, include your file
verification number CMB42067/CHK/UCH22.
Thank You
Mr. Ladi Balogun.
For : FCMB BANK.

subject: Re:   FCMB BANK.
body:
Dear Mr. Ladi Balogun,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am glad to hear that the fund transfer process has been finalized.

However, before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come into my possession and what is its purpose?

2. You mentioned that an online bank account will be set up in my name at China Merchants Bank. Could you please provide more details about this process?

3. What are the next steps I need to take in order to complete this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ricky
